==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|p}} – the original character for either {{och-l|煮|to boil}} or {{och-l|蔗|sugarcane}}. Phonetically loaned for abstract meanings.

Top {{zh-l|*耂}} is unrelated to {{zh-l|*老}} and {{zh-l|*考}}, thus in some forms (notably the form used in the {{w|Kangxi Dictionary}}) there is an added dot to distinguish {{lang|zh|者}} from these others, but this is not present traditionally.
